abstract: Despite the investigation that has ended her career at Hewlett-Packard, Patricia C. Dunn would still tell others to aggressively investigate boardroom leaks.
lead_paragraph: Despite the investigation that has ended her career at Hewlett-Packard, Patricia C. Dunn would still tell others to aggressively investigate boardroom leaks.

headline.main: What Dunn Learned From the H.P. Scandal
